channel.title: [BMDM] dm_stalkx
channel.description:
Hi, i would like to present my work so far with a Half-Life 1 Multiplayer Map remake: StalkX.
Please remind: The Map is heavy WIP. There are no Details added, and Lighting is nearly unfinished.
My goal is to be very close to the original Map.
The Mainyard where the most of the action happens: [url=https://abload.de/image.php?img=stalkx1biu16.png][img]https://abload.de/thumb/stalkx1biu16.png[/img][/url]
The Mainyard from the other side, on top of the crate with the RPG: [url=https://abload.de/image.php?img=stalkx2i0u2x.png][img]https://abload.de/thumb/stalkx2i0u2x.png[/img][/url]
Gauss areal, almost like in the Original Map: [url=https://abload.de/image.php?img=stalkx33zumj.png][img]https://abload.de/thumb/stalkx33zumj.png[/img][/url]
Catacombs. My goal is to get them dark and wet as contrast to the dusty hot oustside areas: [url=https://abload.de/image.php?img=stalkx406uwv.png][img]https://abload.de/thumb/stalkx406uwv.png[/img][/url]
RPG area. Heavy WIP. [url=https://abload.de/image.php?img=stalkx544ue9.png][img]https://abload.de/thumb/stalkx544ue9.png[/img][/url]
My goal is to release a first beta version next weekend on the workshop.
Tips and opinions are welcome :slight_smile:
